title: Premier Polyfil Standalone December 2025 Net Sales at Rs 89.11 crore, up 27.61% Y-o-Y
author: Broker Research
content:
Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for Premier Polyfilm are:Net Sales at Rs 89.11 crore in December 2025 up 27.61% from Rs. 69.83 crore in December 2024. Quarterly Net Profit at Rs. 9.28 crore in December 2025 up 39.13% from Rs. 6.67 crore in December 2024. EBITDA stands at Rs. 13.28 crore in December 2025 up 27.45% from Rs. 10.42 crore in December 2024. Premier Polyfil EPS has increased to Rs. 0.89 in December 2025 from Rs. 0.64 in December 2024. Premier Polyfil shares closed at 40.86 on January 09, 2026 (NSE) and has given -22.91% returns over the last 6 months and -45.82% over the last 12 months.
